meanings.sent1: During the midyears, the weather is neither too hot nor too cold.
meanings.sent2: My birthday falls in the midyears, around June.
meanings.sent3: The midyears are like the center of a sandwich, with the start and end as the bread.
meanings.sent4: In the journey of a year, the midyears act as a pivotal point.
meanings.sent5: The midyears mark the halfway point of the calendar.

meanings.definition: The middle of an academic year, typically when exams are held.
meanings.sent1: Students feel the pressure of exams during the midyears.
meanings.sent2: The midyears are a time when students need to study hard.
meanings.sent3: During the midyears, the library becomes a second home for many students.
meanings.sent4: The midyears are like a storm that students need to weather through.
meanings.sent5: The midyears determine how well students have grasped the material so far.
